title: A2 Trimester 1: Final Fintech Assessment
description: Comprehensive final exam covering digital onboarding, everyday neobanking, cybersecurity protocols, digital credit, and wealth management.

questions.question: Which of these is a typical step in digital onboarding for a neobank?
options: Biometric identity verification with a selfie
Writing a check for the initial deposit
questions.explanation: El registro digital (onboarding) suele incluir la verificación biométrica con un selfie.

questions.question: What is the correct sentence for a fixed financial appointment tomorrow?
options: I am meeting the auditor at 9 AM tomorrow.
I meet the auditor at 9 AM tomorrow.
I was meeting the auditor tomorrow.
questions.explanation: Se utiliza el presente continuo para hablar de planes o citas fijas ya programadas.

questions.question: A fraudulent practice of manipulating people into giving away secrets is...
questions.explanation: La ingeniería social es la manipulación psicológica para que las personas revelen información confidencial.

questions.question: Complete the experience: 'I __________ used a virtual card for three years.'
questions.explanation: El presente perfecto ('have' + participio) se usa para hablar de experiencias pasadas.

questions.question: Which modal verb expresses a strict security requirement?
questions.explanation: El verbo modal 'must' se utiliza para expresar obligación o requisitos estrictos.

questions.question: What does BNPL stand for?
questions.explanation: BNPL significa 'Buy Now Pay Later' (Compra ahora, paga después).

questions.question: What is a collection of diverse financial investments called?
questions.explanation: Un portafolio o cartera es un conjunto de diferentes inversiones financieras.

questions.question: Complete the duration: 'The fintech company has been profitable __________ 2021.'
questions.explanation: Se usa 'since' para indicar el momento exacto en el que comenzó una acción en el pasado.

questions.question: What should you look for in a browser to ensure a website is encrypted?
questions.explanation: El icono del candado y el protocolo HTTPS indican que la conexión es segura y está cifrada.

questions.question: Which term describes the monthly payments made to repay a digital loan?
questions.explanation: Los pagos mensuales para devolver un préstamo se denominan 'installments' (cuotas).

questions.question: Choose the correct comparative sentence:
options: Traditional banks are more fast than neobanks.
Neobanks are faster than traditional banks.
Traditional banks are fastest than neobanks.
Neobanks are more fast than traditional banks.
questions.explanation: Para adjetivos cortos de una sílaba como 'fast', se añade '-er' para formar el comparativo.

questions.question: What is an 'ETF'?
options: An Exchange-Traded Fund that tracks multiple assets
A type of physical bank vault
A social media app for bankers
questions.explanation: Un ETF (Exchange-Traded Fund) es un fondo que cotiza en bolsa y rastrea varios activos.

questions.question: Complete: 'You __________ share your PIN or OTP with anyone.'
questions.explanation: Se usa 'mustn't' para expresar una prohibición estricta, en este caso por seguridad.

questions.question: What does a 'Robo-advisor' use to manage your money?
questions.explanation: Un robo-advisor utiliza algoritmos e inteligencia artificial para gestionar inversiones automáticamente.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'We __________ going to invest in green fintech next month.'
questions.explanation: Se usa 'are going to' con el sujeto 'we' para expresar una intención futura.

questions.question: If an investment has 'high volatility', its price...
options: Is always the same as gold
questions.explanation: La alta volatilidad significa que los precios fluctúan de forma rápida e impredecible.

questions.question: What is '3D Secure' used for?
options: An extra authentication layer for online payments
Measuring the depth of a bank vault
questions.explanation: 3D Secure es una capa adicional de seguridad para verificar la identidad en pagos online.

questions.question: Complete the experience: 'Has he __________ checked his annual yield yet?'
questions.explanation: Se usa 'ever' en preguntas de presente perfecto para preguntar si alguien ha hecho algo alguna vez.

questions.question: Which term describes your total reliability as a borrower?
questions.explanation: El 'credit score' es la puntuación que representa la fiabilidad crediticia de una persona.

questions.question: What is 'DeFi'?
questions.explanation: DeFi (Decentralized Finance) son servicios financieros que funcionan sobre blockchain sin intermediarios tradicionales.
